summary: A bodyslide preset that is a "Normal" sized preset no wacky tits just a warning everything in this bodyslide preset is in reasoning of irl
descriptionHtml:
[center]A bodyslide preset that is a "Normal" sized preset no wacky tits just a warning everything in this bodyslide preset is in reasoning of irl[/center]

[size=5][center]-----------------------------------------INSTALLATION-------------------------------------------[/center][/size][center][size=2]Go to [/size][size=5] [/size][size=2]DRIVEWHEREYOURSKYRIMIS[/size][size=3]\steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\CalienteTools\BodySlide\SliderPresets 

[/size]And drop my XML file into that file go to bodyslide and select "preset" tab under Outfit/body and choose "Normalproportion"

And there you have it my preset
This is my personal liking of a body preset its all based on opinion if you like water balloon boobs be my guest not my cup of tea tho


[size=5]------------------------------------------MODS IN PHOTOS--------------------------------------
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Apachi Hair[/url][/size]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61471/?]Dra[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61471/?]gon Tree Temple[/url][/size][/center][center][size=4]---------------------------------------[/size][size=6]CREDITS[/size][size=4]----------------------------------------
[/size]Caliente-Body/bodyslide
Bethesda-for skyrim[/center]
author: Dragonslade12345
